description:
os/exec: document that LookPath's result may be a relative path
Fixes issue 3622

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go/

Are we going to do something about this https://code.google.com/p/go/issues/detail?id=3622#c11 ? This is most common usage of LookPath.

Alex

I don't see what there is to fix. The docs are now clear.  But the comments
in the bug (and the bug itself) are not. Are you saying that LookPath
should always return an absolute path? What if it cannot?

-rob

You are right. Nothing we can do about it.

LGTM

Thank you.

Alex
